matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

targets.legendFormat: System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete

panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: Memory usage in cluster
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description:
Displays node condition
1 - condition is true
0 - condition is false
panels.title: Node Condition

panels.description: CPU load in cluster by instance in percent
panels.title: CPU load

panels.description: CPU usage in cluster by instance in cores
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: TOP 5 Pod CPU usage per instance  in cores.

targets.expr: topk by(node)(5, sort_desc(sum by (node, pod)(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!='', container!="POD"}[2m]))))

panels.title: TOP Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage in cluster by instance in bytes
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: TOP 5 Pod Memory usage per instance in cores.

targets.expr: topk by(node)(5, sort_desc(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$Cluster", container!='', container!="POD"}) by (pod, node)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Memory Usage

panels.description: Network bandwidth of non-host network pods per instance in bytes/sec

targets.expr: sum by(node)(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster",pod!="", id!=""}[1m]) * on(pod) group_left() (count by (pod)(container_network_receive_bytes_total{interface=~"eth.+"}) == 1)) + sum by(node)(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster",pod!="", id!=""}[1m]) * on(pod) group_left() (count by (pod)(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{interface=~"eth.+"}) == 1))

panels.title: Network Bandwidth

panels.description: TOP 5 Non-Host Pod network bandwidth per instance in bytes/sec.

targets.expr: topk by(node)(5, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", pod!=''}[2m]) * on(pod) group_left() (count by (pod)(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{interface=~"eth.+"}) == 1)) by (node, pod) + sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", pod!=''}[1m]) * on(pod) group_left() (count by (pod)(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{interface=~"eth.+"}) == 1)) by (node, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Non-Host Pod Network Bandwidth

panels.description: Filesystem throughput per instance in bytes/sec
panels.title: Filesystem Throughput

panels.description: TOP Pod filesystem throughput per namespace/pod in bytes/sec

targets.expr: topk by(node)(5, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!=''}[2m])) by (node, pod) + sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!=''}[2m])) by (node, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Filesystem Throughput
